entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain mixed with snow this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending this evening then cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
